sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis said that a southern "cold war" could happen if Stacey Abrams wins Georgia's governor's race in November.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: DeSantis says 'Cold War' could ensue between Florida and Georgia if Stacey Abrams wins governor race

sentence: Florida Governor Ron DeSantis discouraged Twitter from bringing its headquarters to the state following Elon Musk's privatization of the platform, Jacksonville outlet News4JAX reported.
author: Taiyler Simone Mitchell
title: DeSantis takes a dig at Twitter as lawmakers encourage Elon Musk to move HQ to Florida: 'Importing some tech company from San Francisco has not been high on our list'

author: Kimberly Leonard
title: A Republican congressional candidate in Florida paid her home energy bill using campaign funds, potentially violating federal law

sentence: Governor Ron DeSantis signed a bill into law on Monday that will soon make it unlawful to picket outside of homes in Florida.
author: Hannah Getahun
title: Ron DeSantis signed a law banning protests outside of homes and called abortion protesters 'unruly mobs'

author: Yelena Dzhanova
title: Florida's Department of Education asked textbook publishers to avoid references to critical race theory and social justice
